gift_source:
::MC1::
What is the main goal of automatic understanding of images?
{
= Computing properties of the 3D world and recognizing objects
~ Compressing images into smaller file sizes
~ Designing new lenses for cameras
~ Storing pictures in databases
}
title: MC1
question: What is the main goal of automatic understanding of images?

choices.text: Computing properties of the 3D world and recognizing objects
Compressing images into smaller file sizes

gift_source:

~ Measuring voltage in a circuit
~ Sorting files alphabetically
~ Counting the size of a database
}

choices.text: Recognizing a pedestrian crossing a street
Counting the size of a database

gift_source:

~ Storing image metadata
}

choices.text: Assigning meaning to detected visual patterns

gift_source:
::MATCH1::

{
= Measurement -> Computing 3D properties from visual data
= Perception -> Recognizing objects, people, and scenes
= Interpretation -> Assigning meaning to visual information
= Activity recognition -> Understanding what actions are happening
}

question: Match the concept to its description.

}
